member.name: T:SevenZipNET.Attributes
member.summary: The attributes associated with a file inside an archive.

member.summary: There are no attributes. This is the default value.

member.summary: This subfile is a directory.

member.summary: This subfile has been archived.

member.summary: This subfile is read-only.

member.name: F:SevenZipNET.Attributes.Hidden
member.summary: This subfile is normally hidden.

member.name: F:SevenZipNET.Attributes.System
member.summary: This subfile is a system file.

member.summary: The lowest and fastest amount of compression.

member.summary: The second lowest and fastest amount of compression.

member.summary: The default amount of compression.

member.summary: The second highest and slowest amount of compression.

member.name: F:SevenZipNET.CompressionLevel.Ultra
member.summary: The highest and slowest amount of compression.
